page.title: 08TRADE
page.content: There is a sub post office in Kingsland with off-licence general store and a butcher's shop. There are 4 milk rounds (with newspapers) in the area, delivering daily except on Sundays. A baker delivers twice a week and a fishmonger once a week. Other services available in the area are that of an undertaker, carpenter and decorator, a garage with mechanics but no petrol, a cabinet maker, an interior decorator, a rebuilder, a coal merchant an antique dealer and a jewellery manufacturer. There is race horse training in the area and two public houses. One of the latter has facilities for functions and doing outside catering and has been in the same family for over a hundred years. There is also a sawmill, a coalmerchant, a plumber and an electrician.
